name: Extra ToolWindow Colorful Icons
description:
Makes tool window icons colorful. This plugin is based on the ToolWindow Colorful Icons plugin, and adds some additional icons.
See Settings > Appearance & Behavior > Extra ToolWindow Colorful Icons to select icons to (de)activate.
If you find this plugin helpful, you can buy me a coffee. Thank you! üëç

See changelog and readme on GitHub. Check also my plugins.
notes:
1.12.0 (2021/10/30)
  • add colors to Back icon.
  • add colors to Cut icon.
  • add colors to Redo icon.
  • add colors to Undo icon.
1.11.0 (2021/10/24)
  • add colors to Collapse All icon.
  • add colors to Expand All icon.
  • add colors to Messages icon.
  • add colors to Print icon.
  • add colors to TODO icon.
